name: Weijiadi Coal Mine
company_mentions: Gansu Huating Coal and Electricity Company

The Weijiadi Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the Pingchuan District of Baiyin City, Gansu Province

operators: Gansu Huating Coal and Electricity Company
web_search_companies.notes: The Weijiadi Coal Mine is operated by Gansu Huating Coal and Electricity Company, which is fully owned by Gansu Energy Chemical Investment Group.
